backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with data models for cruises, itineraries, bookings, reviews, alerts, shareable links, and includes storage, authorization, and invite-link modules with comparison helpers and initial maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features to their affected frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind and theme variable definitions providing OKLCH-based light and dark mode color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theming, query client, layout, and conditional rendering of shared itinerary pages.
Auto-toast component that notifies admins of new unviewed booking alerts using React Query and Sonner.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing booking lists, alerts, and logo management with auto-marking of viewed alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin role management dialog showing current role and principal ID, with controls to assign admin access.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Booking modal allowing users to select cabins, view pricing, and submit a cruise booking.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Displays a cruise deal card with images, details, favorites support, and itinerary access.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, and delete cruise line logos with image upload and validation.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Shows a grid of cruise line partner logos with loading states and fallback messaging.
Dialog listing the user's favorite cruise deals with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Displays a carousel of featured cruise deals with auto-advance, loading visuals, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with logo, navigation links, social links, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the sticky site header with navigation, authentication controls, and admin/user dialog triggers.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with background image, marketing text, action buttons, and stats.
Shows a detailed cruise itinerary dialog with reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF export options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Manages viewing, submitting, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with rating support.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Provides a search UI with text input and filters for cruise deals, pulling data via queries and updating filter state.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a publicly shared cruise itinerary with images, ship specs, dates, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing a user's bookings, each with status, dates, and linked itinerary details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login/logout functions, and login status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, user profiles, bookings, and related data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for themes, including ocean and sunset palettes, plus utility classes for custom color text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable itinerary PDF by opening a new window and injecting styled HTML based on itinerary data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, layout settings, and extended color themes mapped to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, features, issues, and pending feature requests for Next Time Vacations.
